java.io.Serializable
public class GroupLeaderCommand
extends polimi.reds.Message

Author:
Panteha Saeedi (saeedi@elet.polimi.it)

. Defines all the commands that a group leader can send to its followers or to other leaders.
See Also:

Field Detail

UPDATE_DESCRIPTOR

public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_DESCRIPTOR
Sent by the group leader to notify its followers that something has changed in the group descriptor.

TODO Followers should NOT send an ACK to this message for performance reasons.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CREATE_CHILD_GROUP

public static final java.lang.String CREATE_CHILD_GROUP
A leader ask one of is follower to create a child group. This is useful if the current group has became too big.
